reviewText: My daughter says,"I love it!"We saw this at the theatre - so much fun! We laughed and laughed!Three inept con men sentenced to community service find themselves in the unlikely positions as pastors of a sleepy church. Elijah Rock "rocks" as song leader, transforming the dismal, off-tune choir into the delightful! Children melt the heart of new "youth leader" Stelio Savantes, and con man Richard Speight Jr.in his pursuit of beautiful Audrey Matos finds the deeper things that really matter. Profound nuggets slip between the laughter. Watch it and enjoy!
Title: 3 Blind Saints

reviewText: Great movie for the family. Would also make a great gift and you don't have to worry about anything inappropriate in it.Very funny, great message without being religious, lovable characters and a good script.
Title: 3 Blind Saints

reviewText: Okay, I bought this movie because I love the actor Richard Speight Jr, I'm a rabid fangirl for him. He is the only reason this movie gets any stars at all.It's not that the acting is bad, it's actually quite good. And apart from one incredibly bad special effect/graphic scene the production value is good.However the writing is so abysmally bad that I can only assume this is the college project of someone with more money than sense. Don't get me wrong, they clearly tried, but OMG I made better short films than this in college with a budget of $100 and an old reflex bolex. I actually have a degree in production and this writing is just horrible. It's so trite, cliched and painfully disjointed that if Richard wasn't in it I would have thrown this into the garbage about 20 min in.So they get one star for Richard Speight Jr who despite being given almost nothing to work with still managed to turn some garbage in to comedic gold, and that's it.I strongly recommend that if you are not a fan of Mr Speight Jr, pass this by. He's the only way you are getting through this movie.Next time producers, if you're going to make a movie about an atheist turning into a believer, make sure you write it well. Frankly if I were an atheist I think I'd be downright offended by this movie.As for the $15 price tag, OMG. I really feel robbed as far as the story goes. I could have bought $15 worth of songs or something. If you aren't getting this for $5 or less you are really overpaying.I'm sorry Richard, I can't do it. I want to love everything you've been in, but there are limits man.
summary: Richard Speight Jr is the only saving grace for this movie.
Title: 3 Blind Saints

reviewText: This movie has a very good story, and is a light comedy with a good moral and a happy ending.  Very enjoyable
Title: 3 Blind Saints

reviewText: I'm with Peter McNeely... something does not seem legitimate. 17 out of 21 reviews are 5 star and 3 of the others are 4 star... for a movie I have never heard of before (and I read a lot about Christian movies because I am a youth leader looking for good ones.) The reviewers can not find anything negative to say about the movie. Same on IMDB where all 6 viewer reviews are glowing... either 9 or 10 out of 10. But IMDB, which has ways of determining if a film's rating is being unethically bolstered by friends/family gives the film an overall rating from 82 viewers of 3.4/10. Odd, isn't it?Something does not add up. To write this review I had to give "3 Blind Saints"  a rating so I rated it an indeterminate "3". But I think I will save my money and look for more promising fare.______________________
Title: 3 Blind Saints
